comments.body:
Actually it should not be a property, because [`zipfile` calls `fileobj.seekable()`](https://github.com/python/cpython/commit/066df4fd454d6ff9be66e80b2a65995b10af174f#diff-30e3ce7dc73ea0f34b323c729c652a08R798). This code still doesn't work. :sob:

Could you fix this problem with other PR again? @yongtang
